The following variables are available in your templates:

  • csrf_token
  • csrf_token_field - though it contains the complete html, you may need to safe quote/raw the field. In Mako, ${csrf_token_field|n}
  • flash methods are provided to access this for Mako/Jinja, but, if you want to access it directly, it is available.
  • user - the user model
